column5: Hi all, fishing opportunities have been few and far between for me recently...i do get out with the kids at work regularly but its not 'fishing' the way i like to fish.  Anyway...did manage a pleasant ride round our bay on July 1st with my wife and boy...here's some pics of my boy admiring my monster walleye.                                        ...since i've not been getting out much...i spend alot of time taking random pictures in our yard....Sunsets, eagles and herons.
you can tell hes gonna love fishing

Nice pics Simon    especially the sunset shots Haven't been out as much either..... been targeting specks the last little while    We've been hit by a few cold fronts this past week and a half and took opportunity at a local lake that is stock  Here's a pic of the ones I landed last Sunday before my daughter joined me on July 1st    The byte was steady in the morning..... went 5 for 30   I just couldn't ask for anything better  Little Jack is growing fast and by the looks of it.... will be tagging along with you soon enough!!!  Thanks for taking the time to post those awesome pics and share with us Looking forward to your next report Jacques
Man, he's growing fast, what are you feeding him  Those are excellent pictures Simon.  Joey
Just awesome memories to be had
